tasks.label: Release
tasks.command: g++ -Ofast  -flto -march=native -funroll-loops -g -std=c++20 -Icommon -Itokenizer -Iparser -Icode_gen -Ipreprocessor main.cpp preprocessor/*.cpp code_gen/*.cpp common/*.cpp parser/*.cpp tokenizer/*.cpp -o f3-riscv-asm.exe

tasks.label: Debug
tasks.command: g++ -g -std=c++20 -Icommon -Itokenizer -Iparser -Icode_gen -Ipreprocessor -DPRINT_INSTRUCTIONS -DPRINT_TOKENS_LABELS -DPRINT_MACROS main.cpp preprocessor/*.cpp code_gen/*.cpp common/*.cpp parser/*.cpp tokenizer/*.cpp -o f3-riscv-asm-debug.exe
